trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Minneapolis
There were no other sightings in Minneapolis on or around July 20th 1998
Summary: A friend of mine and I were standing in the middle of a field when a large metallic thing appeared out of nowhere. it was shaped like a ball. It appeared and then it lowered over us and then it stayed for a second or two then it took off at high speed,.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend and i were planning on staying out in that field overnight. We were on the east side of Boom Island, near the river. We were walking towards a small bridge when this gigantic silver round on the bottom object hovered over us. We looked at each other- and then at the thing obove us and watched to see what it was going to do. it only stuck around for a few seconds. it was very large and ball shaped and seemed to float at first but then it rose at high speed into the air above us. it got smaller and smaller than i saw a small flash of orange and then there was nothing to be seen. Our reactions were like 'wow', what the hell was it that we both just saw?'
